page.description: Create a crlf() delimited list of auto-increment implementations for the current SQL syntax.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::ListAutoIncrementImplementations() Syntax List as C = .ListAutoIncrementImplementations() ArgumentDescription ListA list of .... A SQL::Connection object.
Description . Limitations Examples dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v7\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" conn.open(connString) ? conn.ListAutoIncrementImplementations() = "AutoIncrement"
See Also SQL::Connection Object
